section.name: About MMM Util::Core
section.p: This module contains fundamental utitlies that are used all over the mmm project. Everything is designed for general purpose and can also be very helpful for any other project.

Here are some of the features provided by this module:
Advanced Native Language Support (NLS).
PatternCompiler for glob- and ant-like path-patterns producing java.util.regex.Pattern.
Support for converting values.
Scanner for parsing strings easily.
Date-Utilities for parsing and formatting date and/or time according to ISO-8601.
Stream-Utilities for dealing with streams and readers/writers easily.
Process-Utilities for dealing with external processes and creating pipes.
and many more...
